author: BBC News
title: Second casting of stolen gold toilet artwork sells for $12m
description: The first edition of Maurizio Cattelan's work was stolen from Blenheim Palace in 2019.
content:
Sotheby's revealed that Cattelan created three toilets in 2016, with the second version on display in a bathroom at New York's Breuer Building until it went under the hammer.
